title: Suggest a top lamer for low elo
body: Right now I'm thinking like Sion, Malphite, and maybe Mundo, but is there any other good top laners for like silver 5?

replies.body: I would love to suggest Sion to you but he really isn't the easiest champion to play... If you feel like putting the time and effort into it he is certainly a great pick up though.
All of these are really expensive, and I'm only looking to spend around 1350
{{champion:23}}  split push .. all day.. split push.
the only two you gonna wanna play is garen and malphite, mundo is ok I guess too.
Gangplank...farm like a champ, ult other lanes, super OP late game
